name: wxyc_backend
description: An API service for the flowsheet database of WXYC

scripts.dev: nodemon -w src -w .env -e ts --exec "npm run build && npm run start"
scripts.db:start: docker compose --file dev_env/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env up db -d && sleep 2 && bash dev_env/db_setup.sh
scripts.ci:test: npm run db:stop; docker compose --file dev_env/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env up --build -d && sleep 2 && bash dev_env/db_setup.sh && PORT=8081 npm run test; docker compose --file dev_env/docker-compose.yml --env-file .env down --remove-orphans

author: AyBruno
